alert.note: Alert for Green; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:09AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette and western Green Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 208 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cuba City to near Darlington to near Apple River. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Monroe, Darlington, Shullsburg, Monticello, Belmont, Benton, Argyle, Apple River, Wiota, New Diggings, South Wayne, Elk Grove, Fayette, Lamont, Browntown, Gratiot, Calamine, Lead Mine, Jordan Center and Yellowstone Lake St Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
